name: Forest Green Palette
description: Natural greens creating organic, peaceful, and grounded atmosphere

prompt.base: Forest green color palette, natural greens, organic tones, earthy color scheme, woodland hues, peaceful colors, grounded palette, nature-inspired
prompt.positive: forest green colors, dark green (#2D5016), moss green (#4A7C2C), bright green (#8BC34A), natural palette, woodland hues, organic colors, peaceful atmosphere, earthy tones, nature colors, green harmony
prompt.negative: artificial colors, neon tones, urban palette, synthetic colors, unnatural hues, bright artificial

technical.use_cases: Nature scenes, peaceful moods, organic environments, grounded atmospheres

variations.name: Deep Forest
variations.modifier: dark greens, dense foliage, mysterious woods, shadowy forest, primeval atmosphere

variations.name: Spring Forest
variations.modifier: bright greens, new growth, fresh foliage, renewal atmosphere, vibrant nature

variations.name: Tropical Forest
variations.modifier: lush greens, dense vegetation, jungle atmosphere, exotic nature, humid palette

examples: A forest landscape with natural green palette, organic tones, peaceful woodland atmosphere
An interior with forest green accents, earthy natural colors, grounded and calm mood
